
public class Q8B_Java_Ass {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println("Even Numbers");
		int i=0;
		while(i<=10);
		{
			if(i%2 ==0)
			{
				System.out.println(i);
			}
			i++;
		}
		

	}

}

Output:-
Even Number
0
2
4
6
8
10
